body: Just wanted to update that the problem appears to be fixed!  Although I'm not entirely sure what the original issue was.  I rebuilt my model step-by-step, testing outputs along the way.  When I connected the heating and cooling set point schedules this time, they were applied properly and the results show no conditioning outside of occupied hours.  I used identical schedules & set points.  The only difference between the original and updated model is that I simplified the geometry for fewer zones.  I'm not sure why that would have affected assigning schedules.  Nevertheless, I'm happy that it is working!
